name: CharacterAI
description: CharacterAI is an AI NFT system that allows users to quickly generate interactive characters with distinct appearances, voices, intelligence, personalities, and identities simply by providing a brief description. We aim to push the boundaries of whatâ€™s possible and create products that allow users to have fun while exploring the full range of their imagination. Your character will be a unique, one-of-a-kind creation. $CHAI is the utility and governance token of CharacterAI ecosystem. CHAI is used as an incentive for its token holders to receive fees, governance rights, airdrops, and participation in gamification events.
